tha-ap244:0.3_0: Hearing his speech, the most senior monk shouldn’t socialize.
tha-ap244:1.2_0: I plunged into the forest grove
tha-ap244:1.4_0: The Linked Discourses on are completed.
tha-ap244:2.2_0: having raising his joined palms to him.
tha-ap244:2.3_0: I bowed down to the Buddha,
tha-ap244:2.4_0: is the world of the next world.
tha-ap244:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap244:4.1_0: When they have become seven eons,
tha-ap244:5.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap244:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Nāgasamāla.
